text: The Steamroller and the Violin () is a 1961 Soviet movie directed by Andrei Tarkovsky.Свет мой, «Зеркало»: почему Тарковский остается русским режиссером номер одинКАТОК И СКРИПКА == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:Short movies Category:1961 movies Category:Movies directed by Andrei Tarkovsky Category:Movies set in Moscow
title: The Steamroller and the Violin
